mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_user (userPk, property, id, team, myProperty, bResult, success, win, lose, draw) VALUES (#{userPk}, #{property}, #{id}, #{team}, #{myProperty}, #{bResult}, #{success}, #{win}, #{lose}, #{draw})
mapper.update: UPDATE b_user A , pgruser B SET A.myProperty = A.success + A.myProperty, A.bResult = A.success - A.property, B.myProperty = A.success + A.myProperty WHERE A.userPk = B.userPk AND A.id = #{id};
